unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Giving Us Diwali Jitters!**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Giving Us Diwali Jitters!**

unnormalised: Oi, folks! That Diwali bonus might need to stretch further this year. Guess what? Gas cylinder prices got another nudge upwards, leaving our wallets feeling lighter than a feather. Bharat Gas, Indane, HP… they all singing the same expensive tune.
normalised: Oi, folks! That Diwali bonus might need to stretch further this year. Guess what? Gas cylinder prices got another nudge upwards, leaving our wallets feeling lighter than a feather. Bharat Gas, Indane, H P… they all singing the same expensive tune.

unnormalised: Sources whisper the hike's around Rs. 50 per cylinder in Delhi and even more in Chennai. Your biryani plans for the festive season might need some re-strategizing, eh?
normalised: Sources whisper the hike's around rupees fifty per cylinder in Delhi and even more in Chennai. Your biryani plans for the festive season might need some re-strategizing, eh?

unnormalised: "It's all about global energy prices," grumbled a local gas distributor, Sharmaji. "Crude oil rates are through the roof, so we have to pass on some of that pain."
normalised: "It's all about global energy prices," grumbled a local gas distributor, Sharmaji. "Crude oil rates are through the roof, so we have to pass on some of that pain."

unnormalised: Folks are already feeling the pinch. Lakshmi Aunty in Andheri was overheard saying she's switching back to her good old pressure cooker for some dishes to save gas.
normalised: Folks are already feeling the pinch. Lakshmi Aunty in Andheri was overheard saying she's switching back to her good old pressure cooker for some dishes to save gas.

unnormalised: Will prices go down anytime soon? Experts at TERI are saying it depends on a whole bunch of things, mainly global supply and demand. Keep your fingers crossed, and maybe find some firewood? Just kidding! (Mostly.) Time to check those LPG subsidies, folks! Every little bit helps!
normalised: Will prices go down anytime soon? Experts at T E R I are saying it depends on a whole bunch of things, mainly global supply and demand. Keep your fingers crossed, and maybe find some firewood? Just kidding! (Mostly.) Time to check those L P G subsidies, folks! Every little bit helps!
